name: Extreme Skydiving Adventure
description: Create a cinematic skydiving scene with customizable character and dialogue

visual_core.description: A {character} wearing aviator goggles and parachute harness skydiving through clouds, displaying exaggerated expressions
visual_core.style: Ultra-realistic, cinematic, high detail with motion blur
visual_core.camera: Extreme close-up → zoom out to medium shot → focus on gesture → zoom back to face
visual_core.lighting: Bright daylight with dynamic shadows from clouds
visual_core.environment: Blurred blue sky and rapidly moving clouds conveying speed

timeline.action: Extreme close-up on the {character}'s face, capturing exaggerated expression with goggles (wide eyes, slightly upturned mouth, conveying scared yet excited 'mischievous' look)
timeline.camera: Slight unsteady shake simulating initial chaos

timeline.action: Camera zooms out to medium shot, showing {character}'s full body in sky with parachute harness, falling rapidly
timeline.camera: Increased shake emphasizing weightlessness and high speed

timeline.action: The {character} clearly opens mouth, mouthing '{dialogue}' (no actual sound). Simultaneously, it {gesture}, mischievous expression becoming more pronounced
timeline.camera: Focus on mouth and gesture action

timeline.action: Camera refocuses on {character}'s face, capturing smug and defiant gaze after completing gesture, fur blown by wind
timeline.camera: Slight zoom in, shake gradually lessens but remains dynamic

cta.motion: Freeze frame mid-fall with character's expression

gesture.label: Gesture Action
gesture.default: slowly raises its right front paw and extends its middle finger with a hint of mockery

options.value: slowly raises its right front paw and extends its middle finger with a hint of mockery
options.label: 🖕 Middle Finger

options.value: gives an enthusiastic double thumbs up with both paws
options.label: 👍 Double Thumbs Up

options.value: makes a peace sign with its right paw while winking
options.label: ✌️ Peace Sign

options.value: waves frantically at the camera with both paws
options.label: 👋 Frantic Wave

options.value: makes rock and roll horns with both paws
options.label: 🤘 Rock Horns

options.value: blows a dramatic kiss to the camera
options.label: 😘 Blow Kiss

options.value: salutes military style with perfect form
options.label: 🫡 Military Salute

options.value: points finger guns at the camera with both paws
options.label: 👉 Finger Guns

options.value: makes heart shape with both paws
options.label: ❤️ Heart Hands
